CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 贷款；借款；暂借物；借贷业务；贷出；（图书馆等的）借阅处
借出；放贷；提供（资金）；暂时转让（物品）；出借；（向某人）提供使用权

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指通过正式的手续，借数目较大的贷款。在美国也可指借出东西。
指将自己的东西借出给别人，也可用于借喻意义。
指从某人或某处借来某物，也可用作比喻。

word_group.brief_definition: 过渡性贷款 (常在卖掉旧房前作买新房之用)
借来的；借出的；暂调；借调
借来的艺术展品；可供出借的书
学生贷款；助学贷款；大学生贷款
贷款保证；贷款担保；信贷保证
贷款合同；借款合同；借贷合同

bilingual.target: 贷款人批准了我的贷款申请。

bilingual.source: The length of maturity for this loan is five years.
bilingual.target: 这笔贷款的贷款期限是五年。
当铺老板给了我一笔贷款。

bilingual.source: The lender requires a credit check before approving the loan.
bilingual.target: 贷款人在批准贷款前需要进行信用检查。
他在贷款还款上违约了。

bilingual.source: The vig on this loan is quite high.
bilingual.target: 这笔贷款的佣金相当高。
银行批准了他的贷款申请。

list.abstract: loan，英文单词，名词、动词，作名词译为“贷款；借款”；作动词译为“借出；借；借给”。

yingyinNormal.en: Have you looked at the loan-level data? I mean, they're giving these loans to anybody with a credit score and a pulse.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看过发放贷款的数据吗？任何人只要有信用评分都能随意拿到贷款。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm applying for a new villain loan. Go by the name of Vector.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哥在申请做新坏蛋的贷款 以“向量”的名义

yingyinNormal.en: We are not getting a business loan! You tricked me into coming to the city.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不许借商业贷款，你把我骗来市里。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't sign off on your loan. And neither should you. It's just not a smart move.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不能签字贷款，你也不应该签，这招并不明智。

yingyinNormal.en: So as some of you may know, Bear Stearns has just received a loan from JP Morgan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有些人或许已经知道，贝尔斯通刚收到摩根大通的贷款。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, we'll just go in and while we're in here, well, I don't know, ask for a business loan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们就转一圈，不过既然都来了，要不就问问商业贷款吧。

yingyinNormal.en: At least knock me out and put me in the trunk like a person. Okay, I hear you. No loan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好歹也有点人性，把我打晕后塞货车里送来行。懂你意思，不贷款。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, my father went to every other bank within a hundred miles of here, and no one would give him a loan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 父亲跑遍了这附近方圆百里内的所有银行，没一个愿意贷款给他。

yingyinNormal.en: We reformed a student loan system so that more money goes to students instead of big banks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们对助学贷款体系进行了改革，让钱能更多的直接交到学生手中而不是留在大型银行手里。

yingyinNormal.en: If I write a loan on Friday afternoon, a big bank will buy it by Monday lunch. Yeah. Same here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我周五下午签下一笔贷款，周一早上就会有大银行把它买走。是的，我这里也差不多。

yingyinNormal.en: You know what? You're right. You're the business genius. What do I know? Let's go get that loan. Thank you!
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实呢，你说得有道理，你才是商业天才，我懂个屁啊，咱们进去贷款吧。谢谢支持！

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. And I'm the Governor of Illinois. If I sign off on a loan for bail for an accused drug dealer... Cary's not an...
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，但我是伊利诺伊州长，如果我签名贷款筹保释金给被起诉的毒贩。凯里不是。

yingyinNormal.en: We took action to offer millions of students a chance to cap their student loan payments at 10% of their income.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们还采取措施确保大学生每月的贷款还款额不超过其收入的10%，这将惠及数百万学子。

yingyinNormal.en: If you want, I could loan you some money.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你有需要，我可以借你一些钱

yingyinNormal.en: You want to borrow it. Loan it. Purloin it. Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想借魔球，借走它，还是偷走它。是的。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: I want to loan the funds for his bail, interest-free.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想免息借钱给你们帮他保释。

yingyinNormal.en: If you need money, will you please, please, just let me loan you some money?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你若缺钱，拜托让我借给你好吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I've got a push-up bra I can loan you that always gets me free drinks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有一件聚拢提升型胸罩可以借你穿它总能让我得到免费酒水。

yingyinNormal.en: I will loan you the money. Just go to the hospital and let's just get that thing pushed back in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我借你钱，赶快去医院把它塞回去。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't. But the language has a Slavic root, frequent Turkish and German loan words. Took me a couple of hours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 之前确实不会，但塞语源自斯拉夫语，还经常从土耳其语和德语里借词，几小时就学会了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: lend a sum of money or item of property

examination_example.sentence: College <highlight>loan</highlight> balances in the U.S. now stand at a record $1.5 trillion, according to the Federal Reserve.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据美联储的数据，美国的大学贷款余额目前达到了创纪录的1.5万亿美元。

examination_example.sentence: Housing <highlight>loans</highlight> today are easy to obtain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在很容易获得住房贷款。

word_usage.usage: loan作动词时，为及物动词，其后可接名词或代词，如：loan a bicycle
表示“借给某人某物”时可以用loan sb. sth.表达，也可以用介词to来表达：loan sth. to sb.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 借来的物品; 贷款数目

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: lend a sum of money or item of property
a thing that is borrowed, especially a sum of money that is expected to be paid back with interest
sense_info_list.zh: 借来的物品; 贷款数目

examination_example.sentence: Given that there's now over $1.3 trillion in student <highlight>loans</highlight> on the books, it's pretty clear that many students are far from sensible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑到现在账面上有超过1.3万亿美元的学生贷款项目，很明显许多学生并不明智。

examination_example.sentence: If taxpayers are to bear the cost of forgiving student <highlight>loans</highlight>, shouldn't they have a say in how their money is used?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果纳税人要承担免除学生贷款的费用，难道他们不应该对自己的钱该怎么用有发言权吗？

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指从某人或某处借来某物, 也可用作比喻, 常用搭配： borrow...from...。
指将自己的东西借出给别人, 也可用于借喻意义。
指通过正式的手续, 借数目较大的贷款。在美国也可指借出东西。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: lend a sum of money or item of property

examination_example.sentence: In a considerable percentage of cases of debt-induced financial stress, credit cards and <highlight>loans</highlight> will be a central element.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在相当大比例的债务引发的金融压力案例中，信用卡和贷款将是一个核心要素。

examination_example.sentence: Often there'll be a car <highlight>loan</highlight> and perhaps a mortgage, but credit cards often seem to be the gateway to debt-related financial difficulties for many.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通常会有汽车贷款，或许还有抵押贷款，但对许多人来说，信用卡似乎往往是与债务相关的财务困难的大门。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指从某人或某处借来某物，也可用作比喻，常用搭配： borrow...from...。
指将自己的东西借出给别人，也可用于借喻意义。
指通过正式的手续，借数目较大的贷款。在美国也可指借出东西。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a thing that is borrowed, especially a sum of money that is expected to be paid back with interest

examination_example.sentence: They have <highlight>loans</highlight>, bills, a mortgage (抵押贷款) to pay off, retirement to save for.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们有贷款、账单、抵押贷款要支付，要为退休存钱。

sense_info_list.en: lend a sum of money or item of property

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指从某人或某处借来某物，也可用作比喻，常用搭配： borrow ... from ...。
指将自己的东西借出给别人，也可用于借喻意义。
指通过正式的手续，借数目较大的贷款。在美国也可指借出东西。
